channel.title: Macos on MediaGlasses
channel.description: Recent content in Macos on MediaGlasses

item.title: Managing Python on macOS Big Sur
item.description: When Apple releases a new version of macOS it always takes a few months for everything to catchup, following my last blog post where I mentioned that I was having problems installing Python on macOS Big Surwhich meant that my preferred method of installing and managing Python using pyenv, which is documented in this blog post, didn’t work out of the box — and the workarounds suggested workarounds on GitHub made my shell really slow.
